thread.section_title: Servicing Stop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.servicingstop.co.uk | 28 of 390
thread.title: ian

author: ian
title: ian
text:
I run 3-4 cars and do over 40k a year in one of them. thereby thus type of servicing with collection and delivery at this cost makes great sense. I have used them quite a bit now for straightforward work and have had no qualms whatsoever. I know that this is naturally dependant on what member garage you are allocated, the one(s) I have had have been exceptional.
the ONLY gripe I would have is pricing offered for any additional work - I understand that they have a business to run and a margin to recover from such low headline deals, but recent work I was Quote: d to pass an MOT on, admittedly, a "toy" car that had stood for a while, was about £500 - or £250-300 if you shop around....
use for servicing and MOT - no frills and no problems, excellent in fact.
